name: pharma-app
description: MERN Web application for french medical workers to share simple information about common diseases

scripts.dev: concurrently "cd backend && npm run dev" "cd frontend && npm start"
scripts.postinstall: concurrently "cd backend && npm install" "cd frontend && npm install"
scripts.heroku-postbuild: NPM_CONFIG_PRODUCTION=false npm install --prefix backend && npm run build --prefix frontend
